titleStmt.title: Act discharging pedlars pack-man, and common posts, to travel without passes, sederunt his Grace the Duke of Hamiltoun, the Lord Lundin Secretarie of State, the Lord Colingtoun Justice Clerk, Glasgow the 25th day of October. 1684.
titleStmt.author: Scotland. Convention of Estates.
Hamilton, William Douglas, Duke of, 1635-1694.

notesStmt.note: At head of title: royal seal with initials "C R".
Signed at end: Extract by me Sir William Paterson, Knight, Clerk, to his Majesties most honourable privy council.
Reproduction of original in: National Library of Scotland.
